document.full_text: the connections of kentucky derby winner animal kingdom and preakness stakes winner shackleford remain undecided about whether their colts will clash in next month's $1 million belmont stakes.
document.title: triple crown leg winners considering belmont clash
lines_and_colors: the connections of kentucky derby winner animal kingdom and preakness stakes winner shackleford remain undecided about whether their colts will clash in next month's $1 million belmont stakes.
